# init(title:gridButtons:)

**Initializer**

Creates a grid template with a title and a set of buttons.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor init(title: String?, gridButtons: [CPGridButton])
```

## Parameters

- **title**: The title shown in the grid templateâ€™s navigation bar.
- **gridButtons**: An array of grid buttons to display on the template.

## Return Value

A newly initialized grid template.

## Creating a Grid Template

- **CPGridButton**: A menu item button displayed on a grid template.
